text: Flag of Lettonia Coat of arms of Lettonia Lettonia is a Latvian student corporation. It is the oldest active Latvian student corporation. The corporation is established in 1870 at Tartu University. Nowadays, the number of members is about 150 () and about 250 members living outside Latvia. The corporation's motto is: "vitam, salutem, veritatem". ==References== ==External links== * Category:Student organisations in Latvia
title: Lettonia (corporation)
